Description: Secure AWS Infrastructure - Production-Ready Multi-AZ Deployment with Comprehensive Security Controls

Environment.Description: Environment name for resource tagging and configuration

KeyPairName.Description: Optional: EC2 Key Pair name for emergency access

DBUsername.ConstraintDescription: Must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters

InstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for web servers

Properties.Description: Master encryption key for secure infrastructure

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for web servers - allows HTTP/HTTPS only
Security group for Application Load Balancer
Security group for RDS database - allows access from web servers only

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alarm when database connections exceed threshold

Fn::Base64.Fn::Sub:
#!/bin/bash
yum update -y
yum install -y httpd
systemctl start httpd
systemctl enable httpd

# Create simple web page
echo "Hello AWS EC2 - Environment: ${Environment}" > /var/www/html/index.html
echo "Stack: ${AWS::StackName}" >> /var/www/html/index.html

# Create health check endpoint  
echo "OK" > /var/www/html/health

# Signal CloudFormation that instance is ready
/opt/aws/bin/cfn-signal -e $? --stack ${AWS::StackName} --resource AutoScalingGroup --region ${AWS::Region}

LoadBalancerDNS.Description: DNS name of the Application Load Balancer

LoadBalancerURL.Description: URL of the Application Load Balancer

S3BucketName.Description: Name of the secure S3 bucket
